name: Old Man Time VS the Disco Dinosaurs
name_original: Old Man Time VS the Disco Dinosaurs
description:
Old Man Time was on a radical trip through time, when he dropped his disco magazine somewhere in the Jurrasic Period. This event caused a shift in the space time continuum and rapid dinosaur groovy-fication, resulting in sentient, stylish, and GENIUS dinosaurs! With their newfound intelligence, Disco Fever, and resentment for being "Born in the wrong decade, maaan", Old Man Time must journey across the decades to save humanity in this far-out, action-packed adventure!

Only available on Mac and PC desktops
